messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]  Parenting ( was Re: Digest Number 2261
messages.messageBody:
<Concerning parenting books, I have read too many to count and have found many 'so-called experts' don't know what the hell they're talking about!! >

lol! Joz! I feel the same way. Just yesterday, I was reading yet another book on parenting - the title promised a good read. But, I could only take SO much of hearing of these people's perfections and control and how they did everything right in parenting...I said to my dh "These people make me feel sick"! I, too , have learned most from my children and experience and from real stories, honest , sharing books/people...Leonie


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
